name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
description: The official Ice Age: Continental Drift mobile game is here! Scrat's nutty pursuit of the accursed acorn, which he's been after since the dawn of time, has world-changing consequences - a continental cataclysm that triggers the greatest adventure of all. Join Scrat, Manny, Diego and Sid on a wild journey through 13 levels spread across 5 icy environments.
